name: I Can't Believe I Got Sent to an Amazing Isekai Fantasy World!
name_original: I Can't Believe I Got Sent to an Amazing Isekai Fantasy World!
description:
It's my (unqualifying) submission to the OFFICIAL SGB SUMMER 2022 JAM!

It's a tech demo with a lighthearted comedy feel and a cool feature I hope you will all enjoy.

To use that feature and others in your own project, be sure to check out Land of Extensia!
